attributes.action: Stop Sir Mark Walport gainning momentum with GM Crops in UK
attributes.additional_details:
Sir Mark Walport thinks there is support for growing GM crops and GM food in the UK. We have plenty land to grow naturaly grown foods and protect the enviroment and animal lives. We dont know the what the long term issues are with growing and consuming GM crops for ourselves and the greater enviroment, except pro-active food corporations get very rich and could control the food supply in the future!!!. Keep Britain GM Free!!!
PS, Let Sir Mark Walport consume GM Foods for a couple of years and then make an opinion...if he is still alive

rejection.details: No specific action requested from Government.
